cloneProperties(CouchDbProperties) - Static method in class de.crawcial.util.CouchDbPropertiesSource

CouchDbCloneClient - Class in de.crawcial.util
This class addresses a problem of LightCouch and offers a workaround to instantiate a new CouchDbClient from existing CouchDbProperties.
CouchDbCloneClient(CouchDbProperties) - Constructor for class de.crawcial.util.CouchDbCloneClient
This constructor works as the single parameter constructor of CouchDbClient but clones the properties object first.
CouchDbPropertiesSource - Class in de.crawcial.util
This utility class contains a CouchDbProperty loader from files and a clone method for CouchDbProperties.
CouchDbPropertiesSource() - Constructor for class de.crawcial.util.CouchDbPropertiesSource
 
CrawcialUser - Class in de.crawcial.web.auth
Objects of this class represent a user and are used as POJOs.
CrawcialUser(String, String) - Constructor for class de.crawcial.web.auth.CrawcialUser
This constructor generates a new user object to be saved to Crawcial's CouchDB.

CrawcialWebUtils - Class in de.crawcial.web.util
